outline:
1. to move, proceed, advance, move on, become old, be removed
    1. (Qal)
      1. to move
      2. to advance (in years), grow old and weak
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to move forward, proceed, move on
      2. to remove
      3. to transcribe
kjv_def: copy out, leave off, become (wax) old, remove.
strongs_def: to remove (intransitive or transitive) figuratively, to grow old; specifically, to transcribe
